channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title:
乌克兰是欧洲仅次于俄罗斯的第二大天然气储存国，天然气储存总量接近 330 亿立方米。这些设施大大超出了乌克兰国内的需求。
欧盟和乌克兰政府都希望这些设施能够发挥作用 👇
item.description:
Ukraine is home to Europe’s second-largest gas-storage capacity, after Russia, totalling nearly 33bn cubic metres. The facilities massively exceed the country’s domestic needs.

Both the EU and the Ukrainian government are keen to put them to work econ.st/3SFMvGg 👇

item.title: 经过 21 个月的中断，非洲各国政府正在试探性地重返国际债券市场。债务忧虑稍有缓解，但借贷仍然昂贵 👇
item.description: After a 21-month hiatus, African governments are tentatively returning to international bond markets. Debt worries have eased a little, but borrowing is still expensive econ.st/3uypEEv 👇

item.title: 金斯伍德和威灵伯勒的选举结果虽然可怕，但对英国保守党来说却比想象的还要糟糕。工党最近在特别选举中的失利似乎是家常便饭。其实不然 👇
item.description: Terrible as they are, the results from Kingswood and Wellingborough are even worse for Britain’s Tories than they might seem. Labour has recently made upsets in special elections seem routine. They are not econ.st/3ONzWaG 👇

item.title:
拥抱可爱的霍比特人和少年英雄，软化了意大利后法西斯主义的边缘，就像乔治亚-梅洛尼自传中的喷绘肖像一样有效。
@john_hooper 发现，曾经的特立独行如今已成为无价的宣传品。
item.description:
Embracing cuddly hobbits and boy heroes softens the edges of Italian post-fascism as effectively as the airbrushed portraits of Giorgia Meloni in her autobiography.

@john_hooper discovers how what was once an idiosyncrasy is now invaluable propaganda econ.st/3SK07A4

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普威胁北约，波罗的海国家加强防御
item.description: As Donald Trump threatens NATO, the Baltic states stiffen their defences econ.st/3HZnXTy

item.title: 如何避免即将到来的欧盟领导层改组失败
item.description: How not to botch the upcoming EU leadership reshuffle econ.st/3OJnBnQ

item.title: 欧盟 "covid-19 "恢复基金三年来的情况 ⬇️
item.description: What to make of the EU’s covid-19 recovery fund, three years on econ.st/49iGnuD ⬇️

item.title: 停止思考你的下一个观点，倾听别人的观点。这就是如何从工作中的对话中获益 👇
item.description: Stop thinking about your next point and listen to the one being made. This is how to benefit from the conversations you have at work econ.st/3UFEJP1 👇

item.title: 据一家智囊团称，从现在到 2050 年，全球经济脱碳将需要 65 亿吨金属。这将需要大量的爆破和钻探，而现在就必须开始。为什么还没有开始？ 👇
item.description: Decarbonising the global economy will require 6.5bn tonnes of metal between now and 2050, according to a think-tank. That will require a lot of blasting and drilling, which must begin now. Why isn’t it happening? econ.st/49kPKty 👇

item.title:
西方必须找到阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的力量。
他的遇害、俄罗斯政治犯人数的飙升、对普京反对者的暗杀以及对乌克兰的炮击都是同一场战争的一部分。
item.description:
The West must find the strength of Alexei Navalny.

His murder, the soaring number of political prisoners in Russia, the assassination of Putin’s opponents and the shelling of Ukraine are all part of the same war econ.st/3ULHBtM 👇

item.title: 在英国，公众对严厉的新法律的需求超过了尚未立法的社会弊端。其结果是，立法使本已违法的行为变得更加违法❌。
item.description: In Britain, public demand for tough new laws is outstripping the supply of social ills that have yet to be legislated upon. The result is lawmaking that renders the already illegal even more illegal econ.st/3whh4ua ❌

item.title: 俄罗斯重整军备、乌克兰局势恶化、唐纳德-特朗普可能重返白宫，这些因素交织在一起，将欧洲推向了几十年来最危险的关头。
item.description: The confluence of Russia’s rearmament, Ukraine’s deteriorating position and Donald Trump’s possible return to the White House have brought Europe to its most dangerous juncture in decades econ.st/4bJbrFy 👇

item.title: 要想喝到一杯完美的茶，是先倒入牛奶还是沸水？都不是。首先要准备的是微生物☕。
item.description: For the perfect cup of tea, does one start by pouring milk or boiling water? Neither. What must be prepared first are the microbes econ.st/48mLQPw ☕

item.title: 对气候的未来抱有希望的一个更有力的理由来自两个简单的事实和一个令人愉快的插曲👇。
item.description: One of the more robust reasons for hope about the future of the climate comes from two simple facts and a delightful kicker econ.st/3UDGFYv 👇

item.title: 尽管几周前就已预料到阿夫杰夫卡的失陷，但这对沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基来说仍然是一个打击。该镇防御严密，战略位置重要，是乌克兰自巴赫穆特👇以来遭受的最惨重失败。
item.description: Although the fall of Avdiivka had been expected for weeks it remains a blow for Volodymyr Zelensky. Well defended and strategically located, the town marks Ukraine’s worst defeat since Bakhmut econ.st/3OOqmEx 👇

item.title: 强烈的异议不足以阻止弗拉基米尔-普京再次 "当选 "六年总统。而随着即将到来的投票结束，这位俄罗斯领导人将有更大的自由来进一步升级他的镇压运动👇。
item.description: A powerful showing of dissent will not be enough to prevent Vladimir Putin’s “election” to another six years in office. And with the upcoming vote behind him, the Russian leader will have a freer hand to further escalate his campaign of repression econ.st/49GsAxt 👇

item.title: 如何从工作对话中获益
item.description: How to benefit from the conversations you have at work econ.st/3SXcqdM

item.title: 他希望自己的国家能像其他欧洲国家一样正常。不是由贪污腐败者管理，但也因其文化、历史和在世界上的分量而与众不同。这种平衡需要一些奋斗👇。
item.description: He hoped his nation could be normal, like other European countries. Not run by kleptocrats—but also different and special for its culture, its history and its weight in the world. That balance would take some fighting for econ.st/48AkTZ7 👇

item.title: 极右翼最青睐的社交媒体平台卷土重来
item.description: The far-right’s favoured social-media platform plots a comeback econ.st/3I1j78j

item.title: 原来真正的 "常识 "是一种难以捉摸的东西 👇
item.description: It turns out truly “common” sense is an elusive thing econ.st/3HR7kcx 👇

item.title: 一杯完美的茶，从正确的细菌开始
item.description: For the perfect cup of tea, start with the right bacteria econ.st/3I2HnH4

item.title: 杰克-詹宁斯是修建缅甸铁路的盟军战俘之一
item.description: Jack Jennings was one of the Allied POWs who built the Burma Railway econ.st/48dA6yY

item.title: 过去，印度与中东的商业联系主要体现在石油进口和廉价劳动力出口上。纳伦德拉-莫迪如何与该地区建立新的联系？ 👇
item.description: India’s business links with the Middle East used to be defined by its imports of oil and exports of cheap labour. How is Narendra Modi building new ties with the region? econ.st/3T0BmQz 👇

item.title: 只是没有那么充实 👇
item.description: It is just not that fulfilling econ.st/3Sxcdwh 👇

item.title: 近几十年来，全球价值观发生了重大转变，而且是非同寻常的转变。探索我们的互动平台，了解它是什么👇。
item.description: In recent decades there has been a substantial shift in global values—and an extraordinary one. Explore our interactive to discover what it is econ.st/3Spxo3v 👇

item.title: 世界上最强大的电影系列看起来越来越脆弱👇。
item.description: The world’s mightiest movie franchise looks increasingly fragile econ.st/483KgC1 👇

item.title: 肥胖薪酬差距比以前想象的还要严重。这种差距对男性和女性都有影响，而且受过良好教育的人的差距更大。
item.description: The obesity pay gap is worse than previously thought. It affects men as well as women, and is wider for the well-educated econ.st/4bwe2SQ

item.title: 新药可能会终结世界肥胖症的流行。必须仔细研究其长期影响--但兴奋是有道理的 👇
item.description: New drugs could spell an end to the world’s obesity epidemic. The long-term effects must be carefully studied—but the excitement is justified econ.st/3upJ3Y7👇

item.title: 在帝都北京，声音被创造性地用于展示财富、处理日常事务和维持秩序。本周我们将前往 "鼓楼"，播客正是以 "鼓楼 "命名🎧。
item.description: In imperial Beijing sound was used in creative ways to display wealth, conduct everyday business and keep order. This week we travel to the “Drum Tower” after which the podcast is named econ.st/3SGr2wz 🎧

item.title: "詹姆斯-贝内特（James Bennet）写道："美国人可以尽情嚷嚷他们缺乏言论自由，但如果他们不学会重新倾听彼此的声音，他们将永远无法克服分歧，也无法解决任何真正的问题。
item.description: “Americans can shout about their lack of free speech all they want, but they will never be able to overcome their differences, and deal with any of their real problems, if they do not learn to listen to each other again,” writes James Bennet econ.st/3HQXNlL 👇
